About Us
Double Dragon is a traditional family operated Chinese restaurant with over 25 years of experience in the business located in the heart of Reynoldsburg, Ohio. Our goal is to satisfy our customers by offering our most delicious meals at an affordable price, a delightable dining experience, and to leave a smile on your face. Our specialties includes: Cantonese, Hunan, Mandarin, Szechuan, and Thai Cuisine.
In our menu, we offer more than 150 selections, as well as 15 of our fine specialty entrees and appetizers. We also offer daily lunch specials until 4 pm. All selections made will be prepared at the time of order. Many of our customers have thought that we look like a traditional fast-food restaurant. Here, our primary focus is quality . For highest possible quality, all meals are required to be prepared for at least 5 minutes and no longer than 20 minutes.
In addition to our food service, we do also offer wine and mixed drink services. We have over 65 different wines and over 160 different mixed drink combinations to choose from to enhance your restaurant experience.
We do also offer call-in and drive-thru orders for those who do not feel like eating out. Just give us a call or stop by for quicker service. Our phone number is (614) 864-8222 . Average waiting time for carry-out: 10 to 15 minutes
Payments Accepted
We accept cash, and all Major Credit cards and Debit cards. At this time, we are not accepting checks, money orders, wire-transfers, and any other form of transactions. All payments must be done at the time of the store pick-up. We will not accept any form of payments over the phone for security reasons.
History of Our Business
We first open our doors to the public on May 5, 1987 located at 6493 East Main Street, Reynoldsburg. We host many events there at the old location.
After 17 years on that location, August 11, 2004, we open our doors closer into the city of Reynoldsburg now located at 6850 East Main Street.
